body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is David Harris and the customer's name is Lauren Russell.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is David Harris, and I am with Ace Pawn Shop. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, David! I'm Lauren Russell, and I have some questions about your privacy policies.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Lauren! We take privacy very seriously here at Ace Pawn Shop. What specifically would you like to know?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I want to make sure my personal information is safe if I decide to pawn something.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, Lauren. We store your information securely and only use it for transaction purposes. Can I ask, what is your date of birth?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure! It is January fifth, nineteen ninety.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And for our records, could you please provide your current zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my zip code is two zero three zero two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Lauren! Rest assured, your details will remain confidential.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, David. It makes me feel much more comfortable.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that! Thank you for your time today, Lauren. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out!
